title: Nature of the Phase Transition
text: Consider what happens to the molecular motion and arrangement of water molecules when water freezes into ice. How does this phase transition affect the randomness or order in the system?

title: Entropy and Molecular Arrangement
text: When water molecules arrange themselves in a crystalline structure during freezing, think about whether this leads to more microstates or fewer for the system.

title: Change in Disorder
text: Does forming ice from liquid water make the system more ordered or less ordered?

title: Entropy Change
text: If a process results in increased order, what type of entropy change does it suggest - positive, negative, or no change?
